steps.intention: Identify relationships in the food web diagram
steps.note: Analyze the diagram to understand how a decrease in large roach affects other species.

steps.code: impact_predictions = analyze_food_web_impact('diagram', ['Steelheads', 'Stickleback Fry', 'Predatory Insects'], 'decrease in Large Roach')

selected_option = map_prediction_to_option(impact_predictions, [{'label': 'A', 'text': 'The population of steelheads would decrease.'}, {'label': 'B', 'text': 'The population of stickleback fry would increase.'}, {'label': 'C', 'text': 'The population of predatory insects would increase.'}, {'label': 'D', 'text': 'The population of predatory insects would decrease.'}])
